translation.en: I got you, Sensei. Stay with me.
translation.zh: 我扶着你 老师 撑住

translation.en: You're a life saver, Casey Jones.
translation.zh: 你救了我的命 凯西琼斯

translation.en: I learned from the best. Come on, we're almost there.
translation.zh: 名师出高徒嘛 加油 就快到了

translation.en: Bad doggies!
translation.zh: 坏狗狗！

translation.en: Impeccable timing, little brother. Very dramatic.
translation.zh: 时机无可挑剔 老弟 戏剧性十足

translation.en: Help him, Michelangelo. He's hurt bad.
translation.zh: 快 帮帮他 米开朗琪罗 他伤得很重

translation.en: That's it. The resistance failed. The Krang won.
translation.zh: 结束了 抵抗失败 朗格人赢了

translation.en: But… but it isn't over.
translation.zh: 但一切还没结束

translation.en: We've still got a ninja's greatest weapon…
translation.zh: 我们还有忍者的终极武器…

translation.en: hope.
translation.zh: 希望

translation.en: That and a badass mystic warrior.
translation.zh: 那个加上一个狂拽炫酷的神秘战士

translation.en: Mikey, we need a time gateway.
translation.zh: 麦奇 我们需要一个时间通道

translation.en: It'll take everything I have.
translation.zh: 这会让我耗尽所有力量的

translation.en: I know, but this is our last chance.
translation.zh: 我知道 但这是我们最后的机会了

translation.en: It's our only chance.
translation.zh: 我们唯一的机会

translation.en: -Wait, what's going on? Where is he going? -Casey, listen.
translation.zh: -等等 怎么回事？他要去哪里？ -凯西 听着

translation.en: The Krang first came to our planet through a mystic doorway.
translation.zh: 朗格人最初就是通过一道神秘之门 来我们星球的

translation.en: The key that opened the doorway looked like this.
translation.zh: 开启那道门的钥匙长这样

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
translation.zh: 你为什么要告诉我这些？

translation.en: Because Mikey's about to send you back in time
translation.zh: 因为麦奇要把你送回到

translation.en: to the day that the key was stolen.
translation.zh: 钥匙被偷走的那一天

translation.en: Wait, he's gonna what?
translation.zh: 慢着 他要什么？

translation.en: The people who stole that key opened the doorway for the Krang.
translation.zh: 偷钥匙的人帮朗格人打开了大门

translation.en: You have to find it before that happens.
translation.zh: 你必须在那之前找到它

translation.en: Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.zh: 找到钥匙 阻止朗格人

translation.en: -But, Sensei-- -Say it!
translation.zh: -但 老师… -重复一遍！

translation.en: "Find the key, stop the Krang."
translation.zh: “找到钥匙 阻止朗格人”

translation.en: I don't want to lose you.
translation.zh: 我不想失去你

translation.en: Casey, it's not about me.
translation.zh: 凯西 我并不重要

translation.en: They found us!
translation.zh: 他们发现我们了！

translation.en: Mikey!
translation.zh: 麦奇！

translation.en: Master Michelangelo, no! You're gonna--
translation.zh: 米开朗琪罗大师 不要！你会…

translation.en: Casey…
translation.zh: 凯西…

translation.en: when you're done saving the world, do me a favor.
translation.zh: 等你拯救完世界 帮我个忙

translation.en: Grab a slice!
translation.zh: 来块披萨！

translation.en: -[cars honking] -Where…
translation.zh: 哪里…

translation.en: I made it?
translation.zh: 我成功了？

translation.en: All right, Casey, here we go. Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.zh: 好了 凯西 来吧 找到钥匙 阻止朗格人

translation.en: ♪ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ♪
translation.zh: 少年忍者神龟

translation.en: Easy does it, Leo.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 里奥

translation.en: You've got this.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: Concentrate.
translation.zh: 集中精神

translation.en: The whole world is counting on you…
translation.zh: 全世界都指望着你…

translation.en: to break the pizza box stack record!
translation.zh: 去打破堆披萨盒的记录呢！

translation.en: One-hundred, twenty-five boxes!
translation.zh: 125个盒子！

translation.en: They say it couldn't be done, but look who's doing it, moi.
translation.zh: 大家都说这是不可能的挑战 但看看谁正在完成它啊 Moi（我）

translation.en: That's Spanish for Leo.
translation.zh: 这是西语“里奥”的意思

translation.en: Go ahead, my non-lingual friend, count your unhatched fowl.
translation.zh: 继续吧 我缺乏语言天赋的朋友 你就盲目乐观吧

translation.en: My record stands until you reach the top,
translation.zh: 在你到达顶峰前 我仍是纪录保持者

translation.en: which, according to my calculations of wind speed,
translation.zh: 而根据我对风速、

translation.en: barometric pressure, and dew point, is highly unlikely. What?
translation.zh: 气压、以及露点的计算 成功的可能性极低 什么？

translation.en: According to my calculations,
translation.zh: 根据我的计算

translation.en: as long as you believe in yourself, you can do anything!
translation.zh: 只要相信自己 一切皆有可能！

translation.en: Thanks, little brother. No one believes in himself more than me.
translation.zh: 谢谢 老弟 没人比我更有自信了

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: -Yeah! [chuckles] I am Leo! -Yeah, baby!
translation.zh: -耶！我是里奥！ -太棒了 宝贝！

translation.en: [Raph] There you are.
translation.zh: 你们在这儿呢

translation.en: I've been looking all over for you guys.
translation.zh: 我一直在到处找你们

translation.en: Raph, guess who just broke the record?
translation.zh: 拉夫 你猜谁刚刚打破了记录？

translation.en: What? You did? How many did you-- [grunts]
translation.zh: 什么？你成功了？你堆了多少…

translation.en: Stop distracting Raph! We were supposed to be training--
translation.zh: 不要再分心了 拉夫！ 我们本应该在训练的…

translation.en: Ta-ta-ta-ta-ta. Hold that thought.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Donnie?
translation.zh: 多尼？

translation.en: Donnie?
translation.zh: 多尼？

translation.en: You, sir, have bested me. Mazel.
translation.zh: 先生 你成功超越了我 恭喜！

translation.en: -Ahem? -Ahem?
translation.zh: -嗯哼？ -嗯哼？

translation.en: Leo. Leo.
translation.zh: 里奥

translation.en: Leo! Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Stop it!
translation.zh: 够了！

translation.en: Leo, we have work to do, and you dragged him out here for this?
translation.zh: 里奥 我们还有事要做 而你为了这事就把他拽来这儿？

translation.en: Training, record-breaking. The choice was clear.
translation.zh: 训练 打破记录 选哪个很明显啦

translation.en: [Raph sighs] Dang it, Leo. Everything's not about you.
translation.zh: 要命 里奥 世界不是围着你在转的

translation.en: When are you gonna grow up and start acting like a hero?
translation.zh: 你什么时候才能成熟点 有点英雄的样子？

translation.en: And there it is. Gentlemen…
translation.zh: 来了 先生们…

translation.en: -What was that? What are you guys doing? -A little game I invented.
translation.zh: -什么情况？你们在做什么？ -我发明的一个小游戏

translation.en: Every time you say "heroes," we take a bite of pizza.
translation.zh: 只要你一说“英雄” 我们就吃一口披萨

translation.en: I don't say "heroes" that often!
translation.zh: 我说“英雄”的频率才没那么高！

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: So what if I say he-- that word a lot.
translation.zh: 就算我经常说英…那个词又能怎样

translation.en: It's a good word. We need to be that word.
translation.zh: 那是个好词 我们需要成为那个词

translation.en: Relax, Raph. We've got this hero thing wired.
translation.zh: 放松点 拉夫 我们已经具备 成为英雄的条件啦

translation.en: I mean, our ninjocity is off the charts.
translation.zh: 我们的忍术已经登峰造极

translation.en: We've got some kickin' mystic weapons.
translation.zh: 我们拥有上佳的神秘武器

translation.en: And do I need to remind you who has four shells and defeated the Shredder?
translation.zh: 需要我提醒你 是谁 用四枚炮弹打败了施莱德吗？

translation.en: -[Leo] Hey. -[Raph] Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: You just don't get it.
translation.zh: 你就是不明白

translation.en: -[beeps] -Huh? What is all that-- That's me.
translation.zh: 那是什么…是我

translation.en: Looks like we have a 317-39.4 in progress!
translation.zh: 看来我们有个317-39.4待处理了！

translation.en: Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: Has nobody read Donnie's Big Book of Bad Guy Codes? Nobody?
translation.zh: 你们没人看过多尼的 《坏人代码大全》吗？都没看？

translation.en: -Nope. -Never gonna happen.
translation.zh: -没有 -永远不可能看的

translation.en: We did it! We got the whatcha-ma-hoosie-doodle!
translation.zh: 成功啦！我们拿到 梦寐以求之不得的东西啦！

translation.en: Of course we did.
translation.zh: 那是当然啦

translation.en: Nothing can stop Supervillain Warren Stone
translation.zh: 什么也无法阻止超级大反派沃伦斯通

translation.en: and his conjuring compatriot, Hypno-Potamus!
translation.zh: 和他变戏法的伙伴 河马催眠师！

translation.en: There they are! Okay, here's the plan--
translation.zh: 他们来了！好了 计划是这样的…

translation.en: Raph, relax. Who needs a plan when we got crazy cool mystic powers?
translation.zh: 拉夫 别紧张 有这么酷炫的神秘力量 谁还需要计划啊？

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Come on, swords, it's portal time!
translation.zh: 来吧 宝剑 现在是传送门时间！

translation.en: I'll see you guys later after I save the day! Buh-buh-bye!
translation.zh: 等我拯救完世界再见咯！回见您呐！

translation.en: Stop! We need to work together!
translation.zh: 回来！我们得一起行动！

translation.en: Wellington Sunday! It's those pesky Turtles.
translation.zh: 我勒个去！是那些讨厌的乌龟

translation.en: License and registration.
translation.zh: 请出示驾照和行驶证

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, mate. I must have left it in my other jacket.
translation.zh: 抱歉 老兄 我肯定是 把它们落在外套包里了

translation.en: Leo! Ah!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Leo, we're coming.
translation.zh: 里奥 我们来了

translation.en: Don't worry. I got 'em right where I want 'em. [moans]
translation.zh: 别担心 一切尽在我掌握之中

translation.en: Doesn't look that way to me. Donnie, Mikey, Maneuver 12.
translation.zh: 我看着可不像 多尼 麦奇 12技

translation.en: -On it! -Ha!
translation.zh: 这就来！

translation.en: Whip-o-rama!
translation.zh: 鞭子力拉满！

translation.en: Prepare to be Donnie'd by my mystic tech!
translation.zh: 准备好被我的神秘科技打败吧！

translation.en: Oh boy.
translation.zh: 哎哟喂

translation.en: Okay, creeps, hand over the stolen thingy!
translation.zh: 好了 怪物 把偷的东西交出来吧！

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: That's gotta be what they stole!
translation.zh: 那一定就是他们偷走的东西了！

translation.en: I got it!
translation.zh: 让我来！

translation.en: With those clumsy hands? [chuckles] No, I got this one.
translation.zh: 靠你那笨手笨脚？不 还是我来吧

translation.en: Oh, you portal-chopped him!
translation.zh: 你把他给传送门斩了！

translation.en: "Portal-chopped," I like it. Maybe my new catchphrase?
translation.zh: “传送门斩”我喜欢 也许可以成为我的新潮语？

translation.en: Okay, let's see how it fits. "You've been portal chopped!"
translation.zh: 好了 我们来看看适不适合 “你们被传送门斩了！”

translation.en: [Foot Lieutenant] Uh-uh-uh-uh. I'll be taking this.
translation.zh: 这个我拿走

translation.en: The Foot Clan?
translation.zh: 脚帮？

translation.en: Finally, after all these centuries, this is ours.
translation.zh: 经过这么多个世纪 它终于归我们了

translation.en: Yes, well, of course, thanks to us, delivered safe and sound.
translation.zh: 是啊 当然 多亏了我们 安全送达

translation.en: No problemo, partner.
translation.zh: 没问题 搭档

translation.en: Hey, just quietly, are we partners? We are partners, yeah?
translation.zh: 嘿 先静静 我们是搭档吗？ 我们是搭档哦？

translation.en: Oh man, that thing must be dangerous if the Foot Clan wants it.
translation.zh: 天啊 如果那是脚帮想要得到的东西 那它一定很危险

translation.en: Ya think?
translation.zh: 你以为呢？

translation.en: Huh? What?
translation.zh: 干嘛？

translation.en: [Raph] I clearly said, "I got it." Everybody heard me say, "I got it."
translation.zh: 我说得很清楚了：“让我来” 大家都听到我说“让我来”了

translation.en: Yeah, but I got it with style.
translation.zh: 话虽如此 但我的姿势比较帅

translation.en: [Raph] But you didn't get it!
translation.zh: 但你根本没有拿到它！

translation.en: You lost it, and now we've got a Foot Clan situation, Leo.
translation.zh: 你失手了 而现在 我们要面对脚帮这个大麻烦了 里奥

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you to be serious, Leo?
translation.zh: 你要怎样才能认真一点啊 里奥？

translation.en: And end up with a worry line between my eyes like you?
translation.zh: 然后变得像你这样 两眼之间皱出个川字来？

translation.en: No, no, no, I do not want a Raph chasm.
translation.zh: 不 我可不想弄个拉夫川谷在脸上

translation.en: "Chasm"?
translation.zh: “川谷”？

translation.en: You know, valley, gorge, crevasse.
translation.zh: 你懂的 就是山谷、峡谷、裂缝

translation.en: The only reason I have a chasm is I have to worry about you bozos 24/7.
translation.zh: 我会长出川谷来 那都是因为 我时刻都在替你们这些笨蛋担惊受怕

translation.en: You just don't get it, Leo.
translation.zh: 你就是不明白 里奥

translation.en: I'm the oldest here.
translation.zh: 我是这里最年长的

translation.en: I'm responsible for keeping us safe
translation.zh: 我要负责保障我们的安全

translation.en: and making sure we can handle anything that comes our way.
translation.zh: 并确保我们能够应对一切状况

translation.en: 'Cause if I don't, you could all end up dead.
translation.zh: 因为如果我不这样 你们都可能会没命的

translation.en: Sorry, I missed that.
translation.zh: 抱歉 没听到

translation.en: Can you repeat everything from… well, everything?
translation.zh: 你能重复一遍吗 嗯…从头到尾？

translation.en: No wonder you always want to train. You really need the practice.
translation.zh: 难怪你总想着要训练啦 你确实需要练习一下了

translation.en: Let him go, Mikey.
translation.zh: 放开他 麦奇

translation.en: Wait! No!
translation.zh: 等等！不要！

translation.en: Boys! Stop this arguing!
translation.zh: 孩子们！别再吵了！

translation.en: But, Dad, Leo keeps--
translation.zh: 可是 爸爸 里奥一直…

translation.en: No more.
translation.zh: 别再说了

translation.en: You are a team. You are brothers.
translation.zh: 你们是一个团队 你们是好兄弟

translation.en: And most importantly, you are too loud!
translation.zh: 最重要的是 你们太吵了！

translation.en: I cannot hear my TV show!
translation.zh: 我都听不清电视剧对白了！

translation.en: Tristan finally proposed to Annabelle, but did she say yes?
translation.zh: 崔斯坦终于向安娜贝尔求婚了 可她有没有答应呢？

translation.en: I don't know because of you!
translation.zh: 因为你们 我不知道！

translation.en: Be the ninjas I taught you to be,
translation.zh: 拿出点忍者样来 别辜负我的教诲

translation.en: respectful and quiet!
translation.zh: 谦恭有礼 安安静静！

translation.en: Sorry. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 抱歉 不好意思

translation.en: Hey, how am I supposed to find this thing?
translation.zh: 我要怎么才能找到那东西啊？

translation.en: So many people.
translation.zh: 好多人啊

translation.en: How am I gonna save them all, Sensei?
translation.zh: 我要如何拯救他们所有人呢 老师？

translation.en: I really wish you were here.
translation.zh: 真希望你在这里

translation.en: Wait, you are!
translation.zh: 等等 你在啊！

translation.en: I just need to find you.
translation.zh: 我只是需要找到你

translation.en: April.
translation.zh: 爱普利尔

translation.en: She'll know.
translation.zh: 她一定知道

translation.en: Hi, professor. Do you have a sec?
translation.zh: 嗨 教授 你有时间吗？

translation.en: Are you even in this class?
translation.zh: 你是这个班的人吗？

translation.en: I'm April O'Neil, journalism major.
translation.zh: 我是爱普利尔奥尼尔 新闻系的

translation.en: I write for the Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.zh: 我给《东莱尔大学每日新闻》撰稿

translation.en: Maybe I could get some shots of you at the whiteboard for a story?
translation.zh: 也许我可以在白板那儿 给你拍几张照片 写篇报道？

translation.en: Oh! Of course.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -[farts] -So, uh, what… what should I do?
translation.zh: 那么 我该…我该做什么？

translation.en: You know, just write something sciencey.
translation.zh: 就写点科学相关的东西

translation.en: I actually have the perfect equation for your article.
translation.zh: 我其实有个完美的公式 可供你写文章

translation.en: Now a few where you're staring thoughtfully at your work.
translation.zh: 现在再来几张 你盯着白板若有所思的照片

translation.en: [Professor] Oh, I always stare intently at my equations.
translation.zh: 我总是专心地盯着我的各种公式

translation.en: Especially this one.
translation.zh: 尤其是这个

translation.en: You know, I think I should put on my lab coat.
translation.zh: 话说 我觉得我应该穿上我的实验袍

translation.en: -Look at it! -Oh! Okay.
translation.zh: -看着它！ -好吧

translation.en: You know, I could probably stare at this equation all day.
translation.zh: 要知道 我大概可以一整天 都看着这个公式

translation.en: This is April O'Neil, investigative reporter, Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.zh: 我是爱普利尔奥尼尔 《东莱尔大学每日新闻》调查记者

translation.en: For years, this college shot down rumors that a foreign government
translation.zh: 多年来 这所大学一直 极力否认有国外政府支付

translation.en: is paying them millions
translation.zh: 给他们数百万美元

translation.en: to develop a super-toxic herbicidal deforestation bomb.
translation.zh: 用来研发毒性极强的除草毁林炸弹

translation.en: Those rumors end today because I'm about to blow the lid off Big Chem.
translation.zh: 这些谣言将在今天终结 因为我将会曝光这背后的化学工厂

translation.en: April O'Neil.
translation.zh: 爱普利尔奥尼尔

translation.en: -Ooh. This stuff looks nasty. -[shutter clicking]
translation.zh: 这个看起来很有料

translation.en: -Hey! Who's there? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 喂！谁在那儿？

translation.en: Evidence, baby.
translation.zh: 证据 宝贝

translation.en: Oh boy.
translation.zh: 讨厌

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing video ain't the only thing I took.
translation.zh: 幸好我不只拿了视频出来

translation.en: April! Yes!
translation.zh: 爱普利尔！太好了！

translation.en: -Commander O'Neil-- -Catlike reflex!
translation.zh: -奥尼尔指挥官… -猫式反射！

translation.en: What's the matter with you, creeping up on a person in the dark?
translation.zh: 你是怎么回事 乌漆嘛黑的 偷偷靠近别人？

translation.en: What the…
translation.zh: 搞什么…

translation.en: And then I saw that picture and I brought him here.
translation.zh: 然后我看到了那张照片 于是就把他带过来了

translation.en: Sensei?
translation.zh: 老师？

translation.en: It's you!
translation.zh: 是你们！

translation.en: It's all of you! Together!
translation.zh: 你们所有人！在一起！

translation.en: I never thought I'd see you again! I'm so happy I could hug you! [groans]
translation.zh: 我以为再也见不到你们了！ 我好高兴 我还能拥抱你们！

translation.en: Who are you, and why do you have a picture of us?
translation.zh: 你是谁？你为什么会有我们的照片？

translation.en: Yeah, who took this? 'Cause I look great.
translation.zh: 对啊 照片谁拍的？因为我帅呆了

translation.en: What's your favorite pizza? 'Cause I'm ordering right now.
translation.zh: 你最喜欢什么口味的披萨？ 因为我现在要下单了

translation.en: And why are you wearing genius-built apparel?
translation.zh: 另外 你为什么穿着天才假面装？

translation.en: That's trademarked!
translation.zh: 这是注册了商标的！

translation.en: Grappling hook!
translation.zh: 爪钩！

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: -[Mikey] He's trying to escape! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 他想逃跑！

translation.en: -Want me to knock him out again? -Let me.
translation.zh: -要我再把他打晕吗？ -让我来

translation.en: Donnie? Donnie!
translation.zh: 多尼？多尼！

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Wa… Wait, stop! I'm a friend. Let me explain.
translation.zh: 等一下 住手！我是你们朋友 听我解释

translation.en: Let's start over.
translation.zh: 我们重新开始吧

translation.en: My name is Casey Jones, and the reason I have this photo
translation.zh: 我叫凯西琼斯 我有这张照片

translation.en: and your tech is because you gave it to me,
translation.zh: 以及你的技术服装 是因为 这些都是你们给我的

translation.en: but not yet, because I'm from…
translation.zh: 但现在还没有 因为我来自…

translation.en: the future!
translation.zh: 未来！

translation.en: This isn't a joke.
translation.zh: 我不是在开玩笑

translation.en: Please, if time travel is possible, future Donnie would have come back
translation.zh: 拜托 如果时间旅行可行的话 未来的多尼就会回来

translation.en: and already given me all the lottery numbers like we planned.
translation.zh: 把所有彩票号码告诉我了 就像我们计划好的那样

translation.en: It's true. I need you to believe me. Humanity depends on it.
translation.zh: 是真的 我需要你们相信我 这关系到人类的命运

translation.en: In the future, an alien race decimated the planet.
translation.zh: 在未来 一个外星种族 摧毁了这个星球

translation.en: We were hunted. We lived in caves. We ate leaves and rats.
translation.zh: 我们惨遭捕杀 住在洞穴里 以树叶和老鼠为食

translation.en: No offense.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯

translation.en: None taken. We are delicious. [gulps]
translation.zh: 没关系 我们是很美味

translation.en: I know how this sounds, but Master Leonardo gave me a mission.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很离谱 但里奥纳多大师给了我一个任务

translation.en: I do like how he calls me "Master."
translation.zh: 我很喜欢他叫我“大师”

translation.en: Of course I do.
translation.zh: 我当然要这么叫啦

translation.en: You are the greatest ninja the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 你是史无前例 世上最伟大的忍者

translation.en: You told me to find the key and stop the Krang.
translation.zh: 是你让我找到钥匙 阻止朗格人

translation.en: "Aliens." Pfft.
translation.zh: “外星人”

translation.en: Sure. This story just keeps getting better.
translation.zh: 当然啦 这个故事越来越精彩了

translation.en: Splints?
translation.zh: 斯普林兹？

translation.en: "The Krang"?
translation.zh: “朗格人？”

translation.en: I have heard that name.
translation.zh: 我听过这个名字

translation.en: Powerful, barbaric creatures worshiped by the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 为脚帮所敬奉的强大又野蛮的生物

translation.en: Legend says they came from the stars.
translation.zh: 传说他们是来自星星的

translation.en: Ruthless, unmerciful, with one desire,
translation.zh: 冷酷无情、残暴不仁 唯一的渴望

translation.en: to enslave our world like so many before us.
translation.zh: 就是像之前的许多生物一样 奴役我们的世界

translation.en: All seemed lost,
translation.zh: 人类似乎失去了一切

translation.en: until great mystic warriors forged a mighty weapon,
translation.zh: 直到伟大的神秘战士 锻造出了一个强大的武器

translation.en: a key that was used to lock them in a prison dimension beyond this realm.
translation.zh: 一把能将他们锁在位于本域之外 维度监狱之中的钥匙

translation.en: Over the centuries, the mystic key remained hidden
translation.zh: 几个世纪以来 为了保护人类

translation.en: to protect humankind and prevent the return of the Krang.
translation.zh: 防止朗格人重新回来 那把神秘的钥匙一直被隐藏着

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: Future boy is really from the future?
translation.zh: 未来小子真的是来自未来咯？

translation.en: Mind… [imitates explosion]
translation.zh: 脑子…

translation.en: Someone finds the key! Today!
translation.zh: 有人找到了那把钥匙！就在今天！

translation.en: They steal it and use it to open a doorway and free the Krang!
translation.zh: 他们偷走了它 并用它打开了一扇门 释放了朗格人！

translation.en: That's why I came back, to find it first.
translation.zh: 所以我才会回来 为了先找到它

translation.en: Master Leonardo drew a picture on the back of that photo.
translation.zh: 里奥纳多大师在那照片背后 画出了它的样子

translation.en: So to stop the Krang,
translation.zh: 为了阻止朗格人

translation.en: all we have to do is find the key before it's stolen.
translation.zh: 我们要做的 就是在钥匙被偷走前 率先找到它

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Yeah, did future handsome, amazing me tell you what to do
translation.zh: 嗯 未来那个帅气又无敌的我 有没有告诉你 如果

translation.en: in case that already happened?
translation.zh: 惨剧已经发生了要怎么办？

translation.en: 'Cause that already happened.
translation.zh: 因为它已经发生了

translation.en: Oh no, we're too late! [sighs]
translation.zh: 不 已经太迟了！

translation.en: No, we're not.
translation.zh: 不 并没有

translation.en: 'Cause we know who has the key, the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 因为我们知道是谁拿走了钥匙 脚帮

translation.en: Okay, we gotta find them before they use it,
translation.zh: 我们要在他们启用它之前找到他们

translation.en: and this time, we do it together!
translation.zh: 而这一次 我们要一起行动！

translation.en: Uh, can someone untie me now?
translation.zh: 谁能帮我松个绑吗？

translation.en: [Hypno-Potamus] Villain to villain, your hideout is a bit… lacking.
translation.zh: 坏人之间 有话直说 你的藏身之所有点…简陋

translation.en: Might I suggest some velvet, a fireplace,
translation.zh: 我建议弄点天鹅绒、一个壁炉、

translation.en: maybe a fuzzy white cat with a diamond necklace?
translation.zh: 也许再来只戴着钻石项链 毛茸茸的大白猫？

translation.en: Tonight, we liberate our masters from their dimensional prison.
translation.zh: 今晚 我们要将我们的大师们 从维度监狱中解救出来

translation.en: With this key,
translation.zh: 有了这把钥匙

translation.en: we shall free them to lay waste to this world and enslave its people.
translation.zh: 我们将能够把他们释放出来 摧毁这个世界 奴役它的人民

translation.en: Ah, I thought we were just gonna rob a bank and be, you know, crime buddies.
translation.zh: 我以为我们只是要抢抢银行 你懂的 合伙儿犯罪啥的

translation.en: We shall follow the Krang as they lead the Foot Clan to glory!
translation.zh: 我们要追随朗格人 因为他们会带领脚帮走向辉煌！

translation.en: -[Leo] Bored. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 无聊

translation.en: You!
translation.zh: 你！

translation.en: -Leo! -What?
translation.zh: -里奥！ -干嘛？

translation.en: I was waiting for a good spot to jump in, but they just kept blabbity-blab-ing.
translation.zh: 我本来想等一个合适的时机跳进去的 但他们一直絮絮叨叨说个不停

translation.en: There it is! That's the key.
translation.zh: 在那儿！那个就是钥匙

translation.en: Get them! Don't let them interfere with the ceremony!
translation.zh: 抓住他们！别让他们妨碍了仪式！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -It started! -[groans]
translation.zh: 已经开始了！

translation.en: He's unlocking the doorway! We need to get up there right now!
translation.zh: 他正在开启大门！ 我们现在就得过去！

translation.en: Casey, go. We've got you covered.
translation.zh: 凯西 去吧 我们掩护你

translation.en: [gasps] Oh no.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Oh no! They're here!
translation.zh: 不！他们来了！

translation.en: Then let's make sure their visit's short and sweet.
translation.zh: 那我们就让他们这次来访 短暂又美妙吧

translation.en: I'm finally free!
translation.zh: 我终于自由了！

translation.en: The people of this planet will pay for what they've done to me.
translation.zh: 这个星球上的人 将为他们对我所做的一切付出代价

translation.en: Welcome to Earth. I hope you don't enjoy your stay!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到地球 希望你在这里 度过一段不愉快的时光！

translation.en: Enough tricks!
translation.zh: 别再耍花招了！

translation.en: Mikey! Donnie! No!
translation.zh: 麦奇！多尼！不！

translation.en: No…
translation.zh: 不是吧…

translation.en: Raph, what happened to our powers?
translation.zh: 拉夫 我们的力量怎么了？

translation.en: They… They're gone.
translation.zh: 它们消失了

translation.en: What did they do to us?
translation.zh: 他们对我们做了什么？

translation.en: Brother, sister, join me.
translation.zh: 弟弟 小妹 加入我吧

translation.en: Time for us to finish remaking this universe in the image of Krang.
translation.zh: 是时候按照朗格人的蓝图 重塑这个世界了

translation.en: How I've waited for this day.
translation.zh: 我等这一天已经很久了

translation.en: Indeed.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Brother, widen the portal and retrieve our ship, the Technodrome.
translation.zh: 弟弟 把传送门扩大一些 找回我们的飞船 技术场号

translation.en: Once it is here, this world will kneel before us.
translation.zh: 只要它来到这里 世界就将臣服在我们脚下

translation.en: Oh, if you two don't mind, I haven't killed anything in ages.
translation.zh: 如果你不介意的话 我已经很久没开过杀戒了

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Retreat!
translation.zh: 撤退！

translation.en: Retreat? We don't retreat!
translation.zh: 撤退？我们才不会撤退！

translation.en: Leo, for once, listen to me. They're too powerful and Dad's hurt.
translation.zh: 里奥 你就听我一次吧 他们太强大了 而且爸爸受伤了

translation.en: You don't understand.
translation.zh: 你不明白

translation.en: If we don't close that doorway, it's only gonna get worse.
translation.zh: 如果我们不把那道门关上 情况只会变得更糟

translation.en: Raph?
translation.zh: 拉夫？

translation.en: I'm not gonna argue with you, Leo! Donnie, escape pods, now!
translation.zh: 里奥 这事没商量！ 多尼 逃生舱 快！

translation.en: You don't have to tell me twice!
translation.zh: 你不用跟我说两遍！

translation.en: Sensei, we need to get that key!
translation.zh: 老师 我们得拿到那把钥匙！

translation.en: -[Leo grunts] -Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Raph?
translation.zh: 拉夫？

translation.en: Raph, wait, no.
translation.zh: 拉夫 等等 不要

translation.en: Wait, Raph! Raph! No, Raph! Raph! No, Raph!
translation.zh: 等等 拉夫！拉夫！不要 拉夫！

translation.en: [computer] Escape pods incoming.
translation.zh: 逃生舱入场

translation.en: [computer] Congratulations on surviving, fam.
translation.zh: 恭喜你们逃出生天 家人们

translation.en: -Huh? -[grunting]
translation.zh: （逃出生天！）

translation.en: [Donnie] Oh, I hate that.
translation.zh: 我讨厌这个

translation.en: Everyone okay? Anybody hurt?
translation.zh: 大家没事吧？有人受伤了吗？

translation.en: How did we get here?
translation.zh: 我们是怎么来这儿的？

translation.en: Donnie pods. We've never had to use those before.
translation.zh: 多尼逃生舱 我们之前从来没有用过它们

translation.en: So, how would everyone rate their escape experience?
translation.zh: 那么 大家对各自的逃生体验 有何评价呢？

translation.en: "Very satisfied," "Very, very satisfied," "Extremely satisfied"?
translation.zh: “非常满意”、“非常非常满意”、 “无与伦比的满意”？

translation.en: -Donnie! -Sorry. Sorry.
translation.zh: -多尼！ -抱歉

translation.en: Data collection calms me down.
translation.zh: 收集数据能让我冷静下来

translation.en: Splints.
translation.zh: 斯普林兹

translation.en: This is terrible! Why did we leave?
translation.zh: 简直糟透了！我们为什么要离开啊？

translation.en: In case you didn't notice, we were getting our butts kicked!
translation.zh: 以防你没有注意到 我们被人打得屁滚尿流了！

translation.en: -[strains] -But my mission was to stop them!
translation.zh: 但我的任务就是阻止他们！

translation.en: Now, the Krang are using that key
translation.zh: 现在 朗格人正用那把钥匙

translation.en: to bring in something that will destroy the world.
translation.zh: 把一个将会摧毁世界的东西带过来

translation.en: We lost.
translation.zh: 我们输了

translation.en: -Where's my other pod? -Where's Raph?
translation.zh: -还有个逃生舱呢？ -拉夫在哪？

translation.en: Ah, did you know this would happen? Why didn't you tell me?
translation.zh: 你是不是早知道会这样？ 你为什么不早说？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Easy!
translation.zh: -你在说些什么？ -冷静！

translation.en: -Leo, what's going on? Where's Raph? -Leo, what happened to Raph?
translation.zh: -里奥 怎么了？拉夫去哪了？ -里奥 拉夫出了什么事？

translation.en: [Splinter] Leonardo?
translation.zh: 里奥纳多？

translation.en: They…
translation.zh: 他们…

translation.en: They got him.
translation.zh: 他们抓住他了

translation.en: You left Raph?
translation.zh: 你抛下了拉夫？

translation.en: He left himself.
translation.zh: 他自己选择了留下

translation.en: He used his pod to save me, all because I went after this stupid thing.
translation.zh: 他用他的逃生舱救了我 只因为我去抢这个破玩意儿了

translation.en: You got it! Nice.
translation.zh: 你拿到了！太好了

translation.en: "Nice"? They captured Raph!
translation.zh: “太好了”？他们抓住了拉夫！

translation.en: He's from the future! He knew this would happen!
translation.zh: 他是未来人！他早就知道会这样！

translation.en: No, I didn't. This didn't happen in my time.
translation.zh: 不 我不知道 在我的时代 这事并没有发生

translation.en: We changed the past, and you got the key.
translation.zh: 我们改变了过去 你拿到了钥匙

translation.en: That means there's still a chance to stop them.
translation.zh: 也就是说 我们还有机会阻止他们

translation.en: -No, we have to save Raph. Come on. -Leo, wait.
translation.zh: -不 我们必须救出拉夫 走吧 -里奥 等一下

translation.en: If you won't come, I'll go myself.
translation.zh: 如果你们不一起来 我就自己去

translation.en: -We've lost our mystic powers. -We don't have a plan!
translation.zh: -我们失去了我们的神秘力量 -我们还没制定计划！

translation.en: We don't need a plan.
translation.zh: 我们不需要计划

translation.en: "I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen," his words.
translation.zh: “我是史无前例 世上最伟大的忍者” 他说的

translation.en: Shouldn't we talk about this
translation.zh: 在我们冲出去

translation.en: before we run off all half-cocked, willy-nilly, pell-mell?
translation.zh: 噼里啪啦 稀里哗啦前 不该先商量一下吗？

translation.en: I keep being told I'm doing this hero thing wrong.
translation.zh: 大家一直说 我不该瞎逞英雄

translation.en: But I got the key, didn't I?
translation.zh: 但我拿到了钥匙 不是吗？

translation.en: I get results, so now we're doing it my way.
translation.zh: 我取得了成果 所以现在我们得按我的方法做事

translation.en: My son, listen to your team.
translation.zh: 儿子 听从你团队的意见

translation.en: This is not about you.
translation.zh: 这不是你个人的事

translation.en: They made it about me when they took my brother.
translation.zh: 从他们带走我哥那时起 这就是我个人的事

translation.en: Trust me, I got this.
translation.zh: 相信我 我会搞定的

translation.en: Donnie, you're driving.
translation.zh: 多尼 你开车

translation.en: What do we do with this?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么处理这个？

translation.en: We can't just bring it with us, but we can't just leave it behind.
translation.zh: 我们不能随身带着它 但也不能就这么把它留下

translation.en: Then we should destroy it.
translation.zh: 那我们应该毁掉它

translation.en: Splints and I will stay here and take care of business.
translation.zh: 斯普林兹和我会留在这里处理这件事

translation.en: Thanks, Commander O'Neil.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 奥尼尔指挥官

translation.en: "Commander"? I like the sound of that.
translation.zh: “指挥官”？我喜欢这个称呼

translation.en: Oh, look at it.
translation.zh: 看看它

translation.en: -[groans] -Disgusting.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: -[grunts] -Try looking in a mirror.
translation.zh: 你撒泡尿照照

translation.en: Ugh, it's talking at me.
translation.zh: 它在跟我说话呢

translation.en: I'm going to rip out its tongue.
translation.zh: 我要把它的舌头拔出来

translation.en: [Krang 1] Forgive my sister.
translation.zh: 请原谅我妹妹

translation.en: She's got a bit of a temper.
translation.zh: 她稍微有点暴脾气

translation.en: And being in prison for a thousand years hasn't done her any favors.
translation.zh: 关在监狱里一千年 她也不好受

translation.en: You're not human.
translation.zh: 你不是人类

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你是什么？

translation.en: Let me go, and I'll show you.
translation.zh: 放开我 我让你看看

translation.en: You're more powerful than the people of this planet,
translation.zh: 你比这个星球上的人更加强大

translation.en: yet you defend them.
translation.zh: 但你却在保护他们

translation.en: -Why? -It's my duty.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -这是我的使命

translation.en: A word used by the weak.
translation.zh: 一个弱者专用词

translation.en: Many planets before yours have spoken of duty.
translation.zh: 在你们之前的很多星球都提到过使命

translation.en: They too have been consumed by the Krang.
translation.zh: 他们也都被朗格人吃掉了

translation.en: And now our glorious crusade continues
translation.zh: 如今 我们的光荣征程仍在继续

translation.en: to restore the natural order of things.
translation.zh: 只为恢复事物的自然秩序

translation.en: The strong will devour the weak.
translation.zh: 弱肉强食

translation.en: Last I checked,
translation.zh: 据我所知

translation.en: we weren't the ones locked in a prison dimension for a thousand years.
translation.zh: 在维度监狱里被关了一千年的人 可不是我们

translation.en: That's called "trash talk."
translation.zh: 你那叫做“废话连篇”

translation.en: A rare misstep.
translation.zh: 一次少有的失误

translation.en: Once I retrieve the key from your comrades,
translation.zh: 一旦我从你的同伴手里重新夺回钥匙

translation.en: I will bring forth the mighty Technodrome,
translation.zh: 我就会把威猛的技术场号带过来

translation.en: and you will witness the true power of the Krang.
translation.zh: 你们将见识到朗格人真正的力量

translation.en: Now, where have they taken my key?
translation.zh: 快说 他们把我的钥匙带去哪里了？

translation.en: It won't tell you anything.
translation.zh: 它什么都不会告诉你的

translation.en: Let me kill it.
translation.zh: 让我杀了它吧

translation.en: Lady brain face here is right. I'm not telling you jack.
translation.zh: 这位脑子脸女士说得对 我什么都不会告诉你的

translation.en: You don't have to tell me.
translation.zh: 你不必告诉我

translation.en: I'll look myself.
translation.zh: 我会自己看

translation.en: There it is.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: They always do it the hard way.
translation.zh: 他们总爱选择困难模式

translation.en: Our brother and I will secure a location for the dimensional doorway.
translation.zh: 我弟弟和我将负责寻找地点 打开维度之门

translation.en: Take these soldiers and retrieve me my key.
translation.zh: 带上这些战士 把我的钥匙找回来

translation.en: We live to serve.
translation.zh: 誓死效忠

translation.en: You will serve me whether you live or not.
translation.zh: 不论是生是死 你们都将效忠于我

translation.en: [Casey Jones] What is this thing?
translation.zh: 这是什么玩意儿？

translation.en: [Donnie laughs] Hold on to your gluteus maximi!
translation.zh: 你们的臀大肌要抓紧了！

translation.en: The Turtle Tank, baby! It's how we roll in the past.
translation.zh: 这是神龟坦克 宝贝！ 在过去 我们就是这么做事的

translation.en: I mean, the present. I mean…
translation.zh: 我是说 现在 我的意思是…

translation.en: -Ugh! Time travel's confusing. -They're on the move.
translation.zh: -时间旅行让人晕头转向 -他们开始移动了

translation.en: According to the subcutaneous tracker I put on Raph--
translation.zh: 根据我在拉夫身上放的皮下追踪器…

translation.en: Wait, does that mean you put trackers on all of us?
translation.zh: 慢着 也就是说 大家身上都有追踪器？

translation.en: "No"?
translation.zh: “不是”？

translation.en: No, of course I did… n't.
translation.zh: 没有 我当然… 犯不着

translation.en: Based on their trajectory, they're headed…
translation.zh: 据轨迹显示 他们正在前往…

translation.en: …to the tallest building in the city.
translation.zh: …市里最高的建筑

translation.en: That's right, Metro Tower.
translation.zh: 没错 地铁大厦

translation.en: I heard the story so many times as a kid, but I never thought…
translation.zh: 我小时候听过很多次这个故事 但我从没想过…

translation.en: "And behold,
translation.zh: “看啊

translation.en: from their perch atop New York City, the Krang ripped open the sky itself."
translation.zh: 在纽约市的最高处 朗格人撕裂了天空”

translation.en: "What came out was terror,
translation.zh: “涌出的东西令人恐惧

translation.en: and what rained down upon us was worse than death."
translation.zh: 身上滴落之物 比死亡更糟”

translation.en: They told that to kids?
translation.zh: 他们给小孩讲这种故事？

translation.en: Man, the future is harsh.
translation.zh: 天啊 未来好严酷

translation.en: I'm not gonna let that happen.
translation.zh: 我是不会让这种事发生的

translation.en: We need to get into Metro Tower without being spotted.
translation.zh: 我们要神不知鬼不觉地潜入地铁大厦

translation.en: We'll take the subway tunnels.
translation.zh: 我们从地铁隧道走

translation.en: Subway tunnels don't offer much in the way of an escape if we need it.
translation.zh: 万一有需要 地铁隧道里 可没有太多的逃生路径

translation.en: -Are you sure about this? -Yeah, maybe we should--
translation.zh: -你确定吗？ -对啊 也许我们应该…

translation.en: Guys, we're doing it my way. Remember?
translation.zh: 各位 我们要按我的方法做 记得吗？

translation.en: Prepare the site so we may bring forth the Technodrome.
translation.zh: 准备好场地 以便我们把技术场号带进来

translation.en: Yes, brother.
translation.zh: 好的 大哥

translation.en: See? Smooth sailing. We'll have Raph in no time.
translation.zh: 看吧？顺风顺水 我们很快就能找到拉夫了

translation.en: I hope he's okay.
translation.zh: 希望他没事

translation.en: How are we gonna find him once we get there?
translation.zh: 我们到那里以后要怎么找到他？

translation.en: I have a lot of questions regarding "once we get there."
translation.zh: 关于“我们到那里以后” 我有非常多的疑问

translation.en: Relax. We'll do what we always do. Ninja in, ninja their faces, ninja out.
translation.zh: 放轻松 各位 我们就像平常那样 忍术进、忍术碾压、忍术出

translation.en: That's exactly how you freed all those families from the Krang labor camp.
translation.zh: 你当初就是这么把那些家庭 从朗格劳改营里救出来的

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds like me.
translation.zh: 没错 听起来像我的作风

translation.en: In the future, you guys are beyond amazing.
translation.zh: 在未来 你们全都变得卓越超群

translation.en: The mystic powers you're able to harness are on a whole other level.
translation.zh: 你们能够驾驭的神秘力量 完全达到了另一个级别

translation.en: Of course! What about my future?
translation.zh: 对啊！我怎么没问我的未来？

translation.en: I'm expecting big things for me.
translation.zh: 别让我失望 我对自己期望很高

translation.en: How many Nobel prizes do I have? Don't tell me. I wanna be surprised.
translation.zh: 我赢了多少个诺贝尔奖？ 不 别告诉我 我喜欢惊喜

translation.en: Donnie, you were the most brilliant, innovative mind of all time.
translation.zh: 多尼 你是有史以来最聪明 最富有创新能力的人

translation.en: I'm shocked, I am. Go on, continue to meet my expectations.
translation.zh: 我好震惊 真的 继续 继续印证我的预期

translation.en: What do I do in the future?
translation.zh: 我未来在做什么？

translation.en: You are the most powerful mystic warrior the world has ever known.
translation.zh: 你是世界上最强大的神秘战士

translation.en: With those two hands, you sent me back in time.
translation.zh: 用这两只手 你把我送回了过去

translation.en: Actually, there is something I should tell you.
translation.zh: 其实 有件事我应该告诉你们的

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Auto brake engaged.
translation.zh: 启动自动刹车

translation.en: Think we're in the right place?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们来对地方了吗？

translation.en: Looks like the Metro Tower station is on the other side of those vines.
translation.zh: 地铁大厦看起来应该是在 那些藤蔓的另一边

translation.en: Great. Let's hoof it.
translation.zh: 太好了 我们走吧

translation.en: Through the disgusting, drippy slime jungle?
translation.zh: 穿过那些恶心的、滴着黏液的丛林？

translation.en: I know. I know. Leo knows best,
translation.zh: 我知道 里奥最清楚了

translation.en: but I'm not sharing my hand sanitizer.
translation.zh: 但我可不会分享我的搓手液

translation.en: [Leo] Feeling a lack of rush in this rush hour, right?
translation.zh: 高峰时段感觉不太堵呢 是吧？

translation.en: [Donnie] I don't know, Leo. Something feels…
translation.zh: 我不知道 里奥 感觉有些…

translation.en: off.
translation.zh: 不对劲

translation.en: Don't worry. I won't let us die. I'm a mystic warrior.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不会害死大伙儿的 我是个神秘战士

translation.en: "I feel better already," he said without a hint of sarcasm.
translation.zh: “我感觉好多了” 他不带丝毫讽刺地说道

translation.en: Look, the stairs.
translation.zh: 看啊 有楼梯

translation.en: Sneaking in from below was the right move. Those slimeballs will never see us coming.
translation.zh: 从下面偷偷潜入是正确之举 那些粘液球绝对不会发现我们的

translation.en: [April] We tried to jackhammer it, flamethrower it, pour acid on it…
translation.zh: 我们试过用手提钻钻它 用喷火器烧它 往上面倒强酸…

translation.en: I thought lasers cut everything! How did that not work?
translation.zh: 我以为镭射枪什么都能切断啊！ 怎么会没用呢？

translation.en: There's not even a scratch!
translation.zh: 连个划痕都没有！

translation.en: Maybe it was your aim.
translation.zh: 也许是你没瞄准

translation.en: Maybe your big rat head got in the way!
translation.zh: 也许是你的大老鼠脑袋挡着我了！

translation.en: Mmm, I'll show you, fat rat head.
translation.zh: 我就给你看看胖老鼠脑袋

translation.en: Okay, deep breaths.
translation.zh: 好了 深呼吸

translation.en: You said some things, I said some things.
translation.zh: 你说了几句 我说了几句

translation.en: Maybe we should just get back to saving the world.
translation.zh: 也许我们该继续拯救世界了

translation.en: What's next?
translation.zh: 接下来干嘛？

translation.en: This cannot be good.
translation.zh: 情况不太妙

translation.en: April O'Neil!
translation.zh: 爱普利尔奥尼尔！

translation.en: [Krang 2] Come back here!
translation.zh: 回来！

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -[Splinter] Faster.
translation.zh: 再快点

translation.en: Faster!
translation.zh: 再快点！

translation.en: I knew this was a bad idea.
translation.zh: 我就知道这是个馊主意

translation.en: Leo, there's too many. We should go back.
translation.zh: 里奥 敌人太多了 我们应该撤回去

translation.en: No, we're gonna get to those stairs.
translation.zh: 不行 我们必须到楼梯那儿去

translation.en: Leo, we're not gonna make it! We have to turn back.
translation.zh: 里奥 我们不可能成功的！ 我们必须撤回去

translation.en: We push forward, get Raph, that's final.
translation.zh: 我们往前推进 救回拉夫 这才算完

translation.en: Mystic hands!
translation.zh: 神秘之手！

translation.en: Donnie! Mikey!
translation.zh: 多尼！麦奇！

translation.en: Oh no, Donnie, your soft shell! You're exposed!
translation.zh: 不 多尼！你的软壳！ 你失去保护了！

translation.en: We gotta find shelter!
translation.zh: 我们得找掩护！

translation.en: Oh, oh, keep it down, Vomitello!
translation.zh: 忍住 快吐的泰罗！

translation.en: Oh. Keep it down, daddy!
translation.zh: 忍住 爸爸！

translation.en: Run, insects, but you can't escape!
translation.zh: 跑吧 小虫子 但你们逃不掉的！

translation.en: [sighs] Don't!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: The key, human! Give it to me!
translation.zh: 钥匙 人类！把它给我！

translation.en: What did you do to me? What did you do to my face?
translation.zh: 你对我做了什么？ 你对我的脸做了什么？

translation.en: I knew that stuff was nasty! I told y'all!
translation.zh: 我就知道那玩意儿很厉害！ 我早就说嘛！

translation.en: Yes, yes, you're a genius. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好啦 你是个天才 我们走吧

translation.en: [April] Donnie, come in.
translation.zh: 多尼 请回答

translation.en: They found us. Where should we go? Donnie?
translation.zh: 他们找到我们了 我们该去哪里？多尼？

translation.en: [Donnie] We're trapped.
translation.zh: 我们被困住了

translation.en: We are trapped in the subway under Metro Tower.
translation.zh: 我们被困在了地铁大厦下面的地铁里

translation.en: The tank is running on emergency power
translation.zh: 坦克已经在靠应急电源支撑了

translation.en: and is covered in some kind of Krang bio-growth.
translation.zh: 而且正被某种朗格生物覆盖着

translation.en: -I repeat-- -April, come quick!
translation.zh: -我重复… -爱普利尔 快来！

translation.en: We're getting squished!
translation.zh: 我们要被绞死了！

translation.en: We're on our way!
translation.zh: 我们马上过去！

translation.en: But, April, how will we get them out?
translation.zh: 但是 爱普利尔 我们要怎么把他们救出来？

translation.en: I've got an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个办法

translation.en: Yeesh. Remind me to never get on your bad side.
translation.zh: 记得提醒我永远不要和你为敌

translation.en: Casey! [moans]
translation.zh: 凯西！

translation.en: Casey, you okay?
translation.zh: 凯西 没事吧？

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey, anybody?
translation.zh: 多尼 麦奇 有人吗？

translation.en: What the heck was that?
translation.zh: 刚刚那是什么情况？

translation.en: Some kind of drippy, crazy Krang monster.
translation.zh: 某种湿哒哒的朗格怪物

translation.en: No, I mean you! Why weren't you listening to anybody?
translation.zh: 不 我是说你！ 你为什么谁的话都不听啊？

translation.en: Because I was trying to get us into the building!
translation.zh: 因为我在努力把我们弄到 藤蔓对面的大楼里去！

translation.en: That sure worked out well.
translation.zh: 那效果还真是很好呢

translation.en: I was doing everything right. How could it go wrong?
translation.zh: 我每一步都做对啦 怎么可能会出问题呢？

translation.en: Because you weren't listening to your team!
translation.zh: 因为你没有听取团队的意见！

translation.en: You don't have all the answers all the time!
translation.zh: 你不是总能知道所有的答案！

translation.en: I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen. You said that.
translation.zh: 但我是“史无前例 世上最伟大的忍者”这是你说的

translation.en: [sighs] I was wrong.
translation.zh: 我错了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You're impulsive, you're arrogant,
translation.zh: 你容易冲动 傲慢自大

translation.en: and you don't see that every decision you make could cost someone their life.
translation.zh: 而且你根本不明白 你做的每个决定 都可能会害别人送命

translation.en: You want to know what really happens to your brothers in the future?
translation.zh: 你真的想知道你的兄弟们 未来遭遇了什么吗？

translation.en: They die. Everybody dies fighting the Krang.
translation.zh: 他们死了 大家都在和朗格人的对抗中死了

translation.en: The world needs Master Leonardo.
translation.zh: 这个世界需要里奥纳多大师

translation.en: And all we got is this guy.
translation.zh: 而我们却只有这个家伙

translation.en: We have an update on the strange situation at Metro Tower.
translation.zh: 我们收到地铁大厦异常状况的 最新消息

translation.en: All contact has been lost with those inside the building,
translation.zh: 外界与大楼内部的所有联系皆已中断

translation.en: and conflicting reports suggest
translation.zh: 冲突报告显示

translation.en: something is barricading entrance for emergency personnel.
translation.zh: 有东西阻碍了紧急救援人员进入大厦

translation.en: Fools.
translation.zh: 蠢货

translation.en: These creatures should welcome the power of the Krang.
translation.zh: 这些生物应该迎接朗格之力的到来

translation.en: You on the rooftop! Stop and surrender immediately!
translation.zh: 屋顶上的人！站住别动 立即投降！

translation.en: [reporter] We've got eyes on the roof top where the police are confronting--
translation.zh: 我们收到了屋顶的画面 警方正与…

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么啊？

translation.en: You may begin. [roars]
translation.zh: 你可以开始了

translation.en: [man] Look out!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: -[strains] -[Leo] Look,
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: I know I'm not the Leo you knew in the future, and maybe I never will be.
translation.zh: 我知道我不是你未来认识的那个里奥 也许我永远成不了他

translation.en: This whole time I was sure my family needed me,
translation.zh: 我一直以为 是我的家人们需要我

translation.en: but the truth is I need them.
translation.zh: 但其实是我需要他们

translation.en: If we're gonna survive this, we have to do it together.
translation.zh: 如果我们想要成功 就必须团结协作

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Hull integrity, 4%. Breach imminent. Good luck.
translation.zh: 车体完整性 4% 损毁迫在眉睫 祝您好运

translation.en: Whew, good. We have an imminent amount of time.
translation.zh: 太好了 我们还有 迫在眉睫的一大堆时间

translation.en: "Imminent" means "soon," Mikey.
translation.zh: “迫在眉睫”的意思是“很快” 麦奇

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll save us with my mystic hands.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会用我的神秘之手拯救我们

translation.en: Casey must have been wrong about me.
translation.zh: 凯西肯定是搞错了

translation.en: This is it, Donnie.
translation.zh: 完蛋了 多尼

translation.en: We're gonna get crushed!
translation.zh: 我们要被压扁了！

translation.en: -[April] Knock-knock! -April?
translation.zh: -叩叩叩！ -爱普利尔？

translation.en: Anyone order a rescue?
translation.zh: 这份救援是哪位点的？

translation.en: Boom goes the herbicide!
translation.zh: 势如破竹 所向披靡！

translation.en: April!
translation.zh: 爱普利尔！

translation.en: You saved us!
translation.zh: 你救了我们！

translation.en: Uncomfortable with emotion!
translation.zh: 激动得好膈应！

translation.en: Where is Leo? And, uh, Future Boy?
translation.zh: 里奥在哪里？还有那个未来小子？

translation.en: Somewhere in there.
translation.zh: 那里面的某个地方

translation.en: [Krang 2] Faster! They're this way.
translation.zh: 快点！他们在这边

translation.en: I can smell them. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我能闻到他们的气味

translation.en: -[screaming] -She found us! We gotta move now.
translation.zh: 她找到我们了！我们得快离开

translation.en: Oh man, is this what the future looks like?
translation.zh: 天啊 这就是未来的样子吗？

translation.en: Nope, the future is worse. Much worse.
translation.zh: 不 未来比这还糟 糟糕得多

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey, do you read me?
translation.zh: 多尼 麦奇 你们能听到吗？

translation.en: [Donnie] Come in, Leo.
translation.zh: 来了 里奥

translation.en: Donnie, where are you?
translation.zh: 多尼 你在哪里？

translation.en: We've extracted from the subway and are ascending a staircase.
translation.zh: 我们已经从地铁里出来了 正在上楼

translation.en: I'm getting a lot of interference, but if you hold still,
translation.zh: 我受到了很多干扰 但如果你待着别动

translation.en: I can triangulate your position using a complex geo-location algorithm.
translation.zh: 我可以用复杂的地理定位法 三角定位出你的位置

translation.en: -[Casey Jones] Uh, Donnie? -Odd numbers, primes, no… almost.
translation.zh: -多尼？ -奇怪的数字 素数 不…快了

translation.en: -Almost! -[Splinter clears throat]
translation.zh: 快了！

translation.en: Ugh. I never get to use my algorithm.
translation.zh: 我总是没机会使用我的算法

translation.en: Man, I am so glad you guys aren't dead.
translation.zh: 天啊 我好高兴你们没有死掉

translation.en: Ditto.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Okay, before this gets too mushy, we need to locate Raph.
translation.zh: 好了 在过份多愁善感之前 我们得先找到拉夫

translation.en: Can you tell me if he's in the building?
translation.zh: 多尼 能告诉我他还在楼里吗？

translation.en: Bet your momma's subatomic particles I can.
translation.zh: 用你妈妈的亚原子粒子打赌 必须的

translation.en: Got him! He's close.
translation.zh: 找到他了！他就在附近

translation.en: He's almost on top of us.
translation.zh: 他差不多在我们上面

translation.en: Wait, he is on top of us.
translation.zh: 慢着 他就在我们上面

translation.en: [all] Raph!
translation.zh: 拉夫！

translation.en: Quick, cut him down, get him out of there.
translation.zh: 快 把他放下来 带他离开这里

translation.en: Hang on. We got you. Almost there.
translation.zh: 坚持住 我们找到你了 就快好了

translation.en: Raph?
translation.zh: 拉夫？

translation.en: Surprise.
translation.zh: 惊喜

translation.en: What did you do to my brother?
translation.zh: 你对我哥哥做了什么？

translation.en: Improved him.
translation.zh: 改良了他

translation.en: Thank you for this. We will be putting it to good use.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我们会好好利用它的

translation.en: Come, the world awaits destruction.
translation.zh: 来吧 世界还等着被摧毁呢

translation.en: Tear them apart!
translation.zh: 把他们撕碎！

translation.en: We gotta move.
translation.zh: 我们得走了

translation.en: -Leo, move! [grunts] -No!
translation.zh: -里奥 快走！ -不！

translation.en: A shame our brethren didn't survive the prison dimension.
translation.zh: 可惜我们的同胞没能在 维度监狱里活下来

translation.en: Then again, their weakness has no place in my new Krang empire.
translation.zh: 但话又说回来 在我的新朗格王国里 可容不下那些弱者

translation.en: Open and bring unto this world
translation.zh: 打开大门 把朗格的强大力量

translation.en: the mighty power of Krang!
translation.zh: 带到这个世界来吧！

translation.en: [radio] Warning! This is a warning!
translation.zh: 警告！这是一则警告！

translation.en: …appears to be something falling from the sky--
translation.zh: …好像有什么东西正从空中坠下…

translation.en: Begin!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [Mikey] What do we do now?
translation.zh: 我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: I fear we are lost. The Krang are too powerful.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们已经输了 朗格人太过强大了

translation.en: Maybe we could change the future some other way.
translation.zh: 也许我们还有别的方法可以改变未来

translation.en: Guys, it's time to face facts. We can't change the future.
translation.zh: 各位 该面对现实了 我们无法改变未来

translation.en: Says who?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: Says the grandfather paradox, says physical determinism,
translation.zh: 祖父悖论说的 物理决定论说的

translation.en: says the space-time continuum.
translation.zh: 时空连续体说的

translation.en: Look, I didn't want it to be true, but…
translation.zh: 我也不希望这是真的 但…

translation.en: [sighs] …science.
translation.zh: 科学

translation.en: That's it! Donnie's wrong.
translation.zh: 没错！多尼说错了

translation.en: The world is ending, yet the barbs continue.
translation.zh: 世界正在终结 但抨击仍在继续

translation.en: Don't you remember? We already did change the future.
translation.zh: 你们不记得了吗？ 我们已经改变了未来

translation.en: Raph never got kidnapped and turned into a Krang zombie in your time.
translation.zh: 在你的时间里 拉夫没有被绑架 然后变成朗格僵尸

translation.en: -Right, Casey? -No, he didn't.
translation.zh: -对吧 凯西？ -嗯 没有

translation.en: That means we did change the future! We're just in a different… [stammers]
translation.zh: 也就是说 我们确实改变了未来！ 我们是在一个不同的…

translation.en: Bifurcated time branch?
translation.zh: 时间分叉里？

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, that nerd thing.
translation.zh: 没错 就是这拗口的东西

translation.en: You know what that means, right? We still have hope!
translation.zh: 你们知道这意味着什么吧？ 我们还有希望！

translation.en: A ninja's greatest weapon.
translation.zh: 忍者的终极武器

translation.en: Hey, I like that!
translation.zh: 嘿 我喜欢这个！

translation.en: [sighs] Look, I'm done thinking I have all the answers.
translation.zh: 听着 我已经不再觉得 自己无所不知了

translation.en: I don't know how to beat the Krang,
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么战胜朗格人

translation.en: but I do know our future isn't written until we write it as a team.
translation.zh: 但我知道 除非我们一起书写 否则我们的未来就还未成定数

translation.en: So what do we got?
translation.zh: 大家有何想法？

translation.en: Maybe…
translation.zh: 也许…

translation.en: Maybe we don't have to beat them.
translation.zh: 也许我们不必打败他们

translation.en: Can't we just send them back to the prison dimension?
translation.zh: 我们就不能把他们送回维度监狱吗？

translation.en: There's an idea! Donnie, what do those big, beautiful eyebrows have to say?
translation.zh: 这也是个办法！多尼 你那对绒绒乎乎的眉毛有何高见？

translation.en: If we got control of their ship, we could send it back through the portal.
translation.zh: 如果我们控制住他们的飞船 我们就能把它送回到传送门里面

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Now we're cooking. Who else?
translation.zh: 没错！我们开始有思路了 还有谁？

translation.en: If someone on the ground can get to that key…
translation.zh: 如果地面上有人能拿到那把钥匙…

translation.en: We can close the doorway.
translation.zh: 我们就能把大门关闭了

translation.en: And then bye-bye Krang forever, baby!
translation.zh: 然后就能永远跟朗格人说再见了！

translation.en: Exactly. What do you say, Donnie? You ready to fly a space ship?
translation.zh: 没错 你怎么看 多尼？ 你准备好要驾驶宇宙飞船了吗？

translation.en: Literally the greatest question I have ever been asked.
translation.zh: 这是我被问到过最好的一个问题

translation.en: All right, team, we have a plan. Let's go save the world.
translation.zh: 好啦 队友们 看来我们已经有计划了 我们去拯救世界吧

translation.en: Wait, but what about Raph?
translation.zh: 慢着 那拉夫怎么办呢？

translation.en: That big jerk may be covered in goo and half alien,
translation.zh: 那个大混蛋也许浑身黏答答的 变成了半个外星人

translation.en: but he's still our brother, and I'm not giving up on him.
translation.zh: 但他仍然是我们的哥哥 我是不会放弃他的

translation.en: I'm not leaving him behind.
translation.zh: 我不会丢下他的

translation.en: There's the key. Let's go.
translation.zh: 钥匙在那儿 我们走

translation.en: Like Casey said, let's go!
translation.zh: 就像凯西说的那样 我们走！

translation.en: [Donnie] I wish my tech was working!
translation.zh: 真希望能用上我的科技装备！

translation.en: Usually, my cardio is jetpack-assisted.
translation.zh: 通常 我做有氧是有喷气背包辅助的

translation.en: I'm not getting credit for any of these steps!
translation.zh: 现在这些步数全都不能计分了！

translation.en: Hey, question, is it too late to join April's team?
translation.zh: 提问 现在加入 爱普利尔的小队会不会太迟？

translation.en: You two figure out how to hijack this ship.
translation.zh: 你们两个想办法劫持这艘飞船

translation.en: I'm gonna find Raph.
translation.zh: 我去找拉夫

translation.en: So how do we hack this thing?
translation.zh: 那我们要怎么侵入这玩意呢？

translation.en: [Donnie] Best guess, main console?
translation.zh: 最有可能的是主控制台？

translation.en: Unfortunately, it's ocupado.
translation.zh: 可惜 它已经被占用了

translation.en: [Mikey] Uh, new plan.
translation.zh: 新计划

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 跑！

translation.en: Surprise. I've come for my brother.
translation.zh: 惊喜 我是来找我哥哥的

translation.en: Let me guess.
translation.zh: 让我猜猜看

translation.en: Duty.
translation.zh: 使命

translation.en: [chuckles] He said doodie.
translation.zh: 他说屎尿

translation.en: I see you got yourself an upgrade.
translation.zh: 看来你给自己升过级了

translation.en: You'll pay for what you have done to me!
translation.zh: 你将为你对我所做的事付出代价！

translation.en: This psycho routine is a little thin. Where's the character development?
translation.zh: 这个疯子的动作有些牵强 品质提升哪儿去了？

translation.en: [Casey Jones] Leo's counting on us to get to that key.
translation.zh: 里奥就指望我们去拿到那把钥匙了

translation.en: I think I have an idea.
translation.zh: 我想我有办法了

translation.en: Cover me!
translation.zh: 掩护我！

translation.en: Raph, you're coming with me, whether you like it or not.
translation.zh: 拉夫 不管你愿不愿意 都得跟我走

translation.en: I don't want to fight you, but I will if I have to.
translation.zh: 我不想跟你打架 但有必要的话 我不会退缩

translation.en: Oh, you will have to.
translation.zh: 你别无他选

translation.en: Bravo, Mikey!
translation.zh: 好极了 麦奇！

translation.en: There's no buttons, or computers, or anything.
translation.zh: 这上面没有按钮或电脑 什么都没有

translation.en: Just a lot of drippy, ooey-gooey disgustingness.
translation.zh: 只有一大堆湿哒哒 黏唧唧的恶心玩意儿

translation.en: I don't know how to hack in…
translation.zh: 我不知道要怎么入侵…

translation.en: Oh God, I know what I have to do.
translation.zh: 天啊 我知道该怎么做了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: No, I don't think I can do this.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得我做不到

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[gulps]
translation.zh: 你在说什么呢？

translation.en: Oh no!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: That's… [wretches] …so gross!
translation.zh: 太恶心了！

translation.en: -I can't do it. -I believe in you!
translation.zh: -我做不到 -我相信你！

translation.en: -No, it's my worst nightmare. -I know.
translation.zh: -这是我最可怕的噩梦 -我知道

translation.en: I'm doing it! I'm doing it!
translation.zh: 我要上了！

translation.en: Raph, I know you're in there somewhere. You've gotta snap out of this!
translation.zh: 拉夫 我知道你还在里面 你一定要挣脱出来！

translation.en: Do you feel what the power of the Krang can do?
translation.zh: 你感受到朗格之力的威力了吗？

translation.en: I am saving this weak planet!
translation.zh: 我是在拯救这个孱弱的星球！

translation.en: I am a gift!
translation.zh: 我是你们的天赐礼物！

translation.en: It's not working. I need more of a connection.
translation.zh: 没有用 我需要更多的接触点

translation.en: Mikey, take off my battle shell.
translation.zh: 麦奇 把我的战斗壳脱下来

translation.en: No, you're too vulnerable with just your soft shell.
translation.zh: 不行 只有软壳的话你太容易受伤了

translation.en: There's no time, hurry.
translation.zh: 没时间了 快点

translation.en: Donnie? [yelps]
translation.zh: 多尼？

translation.en: Mikey, I am…
translation.zh: 麦奇 我成了…

translation.en: a spaceship!
translation.zh: 一艘宇宙飞船！

translation.en: I'm trying to save you, you idiot!
translation.zh: 我是在救你 笨蛋！

translation.en: Why do you have to make things so hard?
translation.zh: 你为什么要把事情变得这么复杂？

translation.en: You want to keep coming at me? Go ahead. I'm done fighting you.
translation.zh: 你想继续攻击我吗？ 来吧 我不想再和你打了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Finally, man and machine
translation.zh: 终于 人类和机器

translation.en: entwixed in perfect bionic synergy!
translation.zh: 在完美的仿生协同作用下 融合在了一起！

translation.en: How dare you desecrate Krang's ship!
translation.zh: 你竟敢亵渎朗格人的飞船！

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey!
translation.zh: 多尼 麦奇！

translation.en: I don't want to fight anymore.
translation.zh: 我不想再打了

translation.en: I was fighting you because I didn't understand you,
translation.zh: 我以前和你作对 是因为我不理解你

translation.en: but now I get it.
translation.zh: 但现在我明白了

translation.en: I always figured you were mad because you didn't like the way I did things.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得你生气 是因为你不喜欢我做事的方式

translation.en: But when I see what's happening to you,
translation.zh: 但当我看到了你的遭遇

translation.en: and what's happening to them…
translation.zh: 看到了他们的遭遇…

translation.en: I realized it wasn't about me.
translation.zh: 我意识到了这不是我一个人的事

translation.en: You didn't yell because you were mad, you yelled because you were scared.
translation.zh: 你大喊大叫不是因为生气 你大喊大叫是因为你害怕

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for the lives you protect.
translation.zh: 要对自己所保护的生命负责 是很可怕的

translation.en: Your team… your family,
translation.zh: 你的团队…你的家人

translation.en: but we do it anyway because that's what it means to be a hero.
translation.zh: 但我们还是得那么做 因为这就是英雄该做的事

translation.en: If this is it, I want you to know I finally understand.
translation.zh: 如果这就是结局 我希望你知道 我终于明白了

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Raph, Raph, there you are! Come back! Your family needs you.
translation.zh: 拉夫 你醒了！快回来！ 你的家人需要你

translation.en: -Leo? -Yes!
translation.zh: -里奥？ -是我！

translation.en: Mikey, Donnie, we can fight this.
translation.zh: 麦奇 多尼 我们能够战胜这些的

translation.en: Raph's doing it for us, so we do it for him.
translation.zh: 拉夫正在为我们这么做 所以我们也要为他这样做

translation.en: That alien jerkface thinks we're weak
translation.zh: 那个外星混蛋认为我们不堪一击

translation.en: because he hasn't seen what we can do…
translation.zh: 因为他还没见识过…

translation.en: when we fight together!
translation.zh: 我们团结一心的实力！

translation.en: It's pointless to resist Krang.
translation.zh: 在朗格面前 顽抗是毫无意义的

translation.en: Give up!
translation.zh: 放弃吧！

translation.en: You will be consumed like everyone else on this pathetic planet!
translation.zh: 你们会和这个 可悲星球上的其他人一样遭到吞噬！

translation.en: -[yells] -Fat chance.
translation.zh: 净做春秋大梦

translation.en: We're not like everyone else on this planet.
translation.zh: 我们和这个星球上的其他人不一样

translation.en: We are…
translation.zh: 我们是…

translation.en: …the Teenage…
translation.zh: …少年…

translation.en: -…Mutant… -…Ninja…
…Turtles!
translation.zh: …神龟！

translation.en: If this isn't the poster shot, someone's getting fired.
translation.zh: 如果这画面不用来做海报 有人就要被炒鱿鱼了

translation.en: -[thuds] -Oh, we are not done yet.
translation.zh: 我们还没结束呢

translation.en: April O'Neil!
translation.zh: 爱普利尔奥尼尔！

translation.en: That's payback.
translation.zh: 这就是报应

translation.en: Keep her under that building until I bring it down.
translation.zh: 别让她离开那座建筑 直到我把它砸倒

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Casey, get out of there!
translation.zh: 凯西 快出来！

translation.en: Commander O'Neil!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔指挥官！

translation.en: Nice shot.
translation.zh: 好球

translation.en: Donnie's almost got the ship to the other side. I have to get to the key.
translation.zh: 多尼就快把飞船送回去了 我得去拿钥匙

translation.en: See ya.
translation.zh: 回见

translation.en: Come in, Sensei, it's Casey. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 请回答 老师 我是凯西 听得到吗？

translation.en: Come in, Sensei! Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 请回答 老师！听得到吗？

translation.en: Okay! Donnie!
translation.zh: 好了！多尼！

translation.en: Cowabunga!
translation.zh: 卡哇棒嘎！

translation.en: [Mikey] Flip-o-rama!
translation.zh: 甩鞭力拉满！

translation.en: Let's roll.
translation.zh: 大展身手吧

translation.en: Ka-zoom!
translation.zh: 卡佐姆！

translation.en: Raph, go.
translation.zh: 拉夫 快去

translation.en: On it!
translation.zh: 交给我！

translation.en: Gotcha! Don't worry, Donnie!
translation.zh: 抓住你们了！别担心 多尼！

translation.en: This is not a hug. It's a rescue!
translation.zh: 这不是拥抱 是救援！

translation.en: Where are we? Staten Island?
translation.zh: 我们在哪儿呢？斯塔顿岛？

translation.en: Oh, gross.
translation.zh: 好恶心

translation.en: So how would everyone rate that rescue experience? Unsatisfied?
translation.zh: 那么大家对刚刚的救援有何评价呢？ 不满意？

translation.en: Very unsatisfied? Wish Donnie would have done it? Um-hum?
translation.zh: 非常不满意？ 希望救援是由多尼完成的？

translation.en: -[grunts] -Donnie.
translation.zh: 多尼

translation.en: Leo's still up there.
translation.zh: 里奥还在那上面

translation.en: Casey. Casey, come in.
translation.zh: 凯西 凯西 请回答

translation.en: Sensei, I'm here. And I've got eyes on the key.
translation.zh: 老师 我来了 我已经看到钥匙了

translation.en: Tell me when you're home free, and I'll pull the plug.
translation.zh: 等你安全回来了就告诉我 我会把钥匙拔掉

translation.en: Casey, listen to me.
translation.zh: 凯西 听我说

translation.en: When I get to the other side, you close that door.
translation.zh: 等我到了另一边 你就把门关上

translation.en: What? Sensei, no!
translation.zh: 什么？老师 不要！

translation.en: [Leo] Casey, it's the only way. He's too strong.
translation.zh: 凯西 这是唯一的办法 他太强了

translation.en: He's not gonna stay on the other side unless I keep him there.
translation.zh: 除非我把他困住 否则他是不会自己待在另一边的

translation.en: [Casey Jones] There has to be another way!
translation.zh: 一定还有其他办法的！

translation.en: [Leo] We tried everything, Case. This is the only way.
translation.zh: 我们全都试过了 凯斯 这是唯一的方法

translation.en: Leo, please don't do this! Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥 拜托别这么做！里奥！

translation.en: You're one to talk, big bro. Hero moves are totally your style.
translation.zh: 你还好意思说呢 大哥 逞英雄绝对是你的作风

translation.en: Outmatched and alone, yet you persist.
translation.zh: 技不如人 单枪匹马 但你还在顽抗

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 为了什么？

translation.en: Honor, redemption?
translation.zh: 荣誉 赎罪？

translation.en: Sacrifice? All meaningless.
translation.zh: 牺牲？全都毫无意义

translation.en: We'll see about that.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧吧

translation.en: [Casey Jones] Leo, please! I can't lose you again.
translation.zh: 里奥 求你了！我不能再次失去你

translation.en: [Leo] Hey, future me would be real proud of you. I'm proud of you.
translation.zh: 嘿 未来的我一定会以你为荣的 我以你为荣

translation.en: Weak words, weak actions.
translation.zh: 无力的言语 无力的行为

translation.en: I have forever known what you fail to understand,
translation.zh: 我向来都清楚一个 你们搞不明白的道理

translation.en: strength always prevails!
translation.zh: 强者为尊！

translation.en: What you fail to understand is I missed on purpose.
translation.zh: 而你不明白的是 我是故意刺偏的

translation.en: No, enough of your little tricks.
translation.zh: 不 别再耍你的小把戏了

translation.en: Casey, close the portal now.
translation.zh: 凯西 立刻关上传送门

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: No! Let go of me!
translation.zh: 不！放开我！

translation.en: Casey, please.
translation.zh: 凯西 拜托

translation.en: You've been portal chopped.
translation.zh: 你被传送门斩了

translation.en: You…
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: You've ruined everything!
translation.zh: 你把一切都毁了！

translation.en: And now… [chuckles] …my wrath will be reserved for you alone.
translation.zh: 现在 我的愤怒只留给你独享了

translation.en: You think you've won, you wretched little pest?
translation.zh: 你以为自己赢了吗 讨厌的害人精？

translation.en: Wipe that grin off your face!
translation.zh: 擦掉你脸上的笑容！

translation.en: Mikey, it's over.
translation.zh: 麦奇 结束了

translation.en: Leo never gave up on us.
translation.zh: 里奥从来没有放弃过我们

translation.en: I'm not giving up on him.
translation.zh: 我也不会放弃他的

translation.en: Whoa. Mikey, whatever you're doing, don't stop!
translation.zh: 麦奇 不管你在做什么 别停下！

translation.en: We're here, Mikey. Together.
translation.zh: 我们与你同在 麦奇

translation.en: [sighs] Took you guys long enough.
translation.zh: 你们还真够慢的

translation.en: [Raph] Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: -Leo? -Hey.
translation.zh: -里奥？ -嘿

translation.en: Eww! Are we in Staten Island?
translation.zh: 我们是在斯塔顿岛吗？

translation.en: -Come here! -Aww!
translation.zh: 过来！

translation.en: No pictures.
translation.zh: 不许拍照

translation.en: [Casey Jones] So this is "grabbing a slice"?
translation.zh: 所以这就是“来块披萨”？

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: Wait for it.
translation.zh: 等着瞧

translation.en: So much better than rats!
translation.zh: 比老鼠好吃太多了！

translation.en: Hey, the rest of the world we saved is pretty great too.
translation.zh: 我们救下的这个世界 其他的东西也都很棒

translation.en: All right, everybody, look up here.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 抬头看这儿

translation.en: April, you just got a message from someone named "Cassandra."
translation.zh: 爱普利尔 你刚刚收到一条 来自“卡珊德拉”的信息

translation.en: Looks like our friend Cassandra has been busy.
translation.zh: 看来我们这位卡珊德拉朋友 一直没闲着啊

translation.en: That's my mom!
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈！

translation.en: There goes the space-time continuum.
translation.zh: 这就是时空连续体啦

translation.en: -[April laughs] -You did it, little brother.
translation.zh: 你做到了 老弟

translation.en: You really did it.
translation.zh: 你真的做到了

translation.en: I'm proud of you.
translation.zh: 我以你为荣

translation.en: [gulps] This wasn't about me.
translation.zh: 重点不是我

translation.en: It was about all of us doing what needed to be done
translation.zh: 而是我们所有人一起 去做该做的事

translation.en: because we're heroes.
translation.zh: 因为我们是英雄

translation.en: [laughs] You said "heroes."
translation.zh: 你刚刚说了“英雄”

translation.en: There it is, gentlemen, our home.
translation.zh: 看啊 各位 我们的家园

translation.en: What a town.
translation.zh: 多美的城市

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: And if it needs defending, we'll always rise to the challenge.
translation.zh: 如果它需要保护 我们将随时迎接挑战

translation.en: Speaking of which, you know what challenge I'm gonna rise to?
translation.zh: 说到这个 你们知道我要去挑战什么吗？

translation.en: -Beating that record! -Yay!
translation.zh: 打破那个记录！

translation.en: No way! No, okay, fine.
translation.zh: 不可能！不 好吧 行

translation.en: [Leo] All right, Big Raphie, let's do it!
translation.zh: 好 大个子拉夫夫 开始吧！

translation.en: [all chanting] Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph!
translation.zh: 拉夫！拉夫！
